Source.Name: qt4-fsarchiver
Source.Summary: qt4-fsarchiver is a GUI for the program fsarchiver to save/restore partitions, folders and MBR/GPT
Source.Description: Backing and restoring GUID Partition Table is possible. Clone a hard drive, create und restore an Image from a hard drive.There are deb-packages for Ubuntu, Debian and Linux-Mint, rpm packages for Fedora20 and SUSE. New: Spanish and Italian has been added. In Progress: Dutch, French, Japanese and Romanian
